EN.q: Why did the avocado go to the wedding?

EN.a: They just let it guac â„ï¸

EN.q: Why was the avocado investigation useless?
EN.a: Because they couldn't find any hard evidence (just mush).

EN.q: What is an avocado's favorite sport?
What did the avocado say to the bread?
EN.a: I think we're meant to be toast-gether.

EN.q: Why are avocados so good at keeping secrets?
EN.a: Because they keep everything in their core.

EN.q: What's an avocado's philosophy of life?
EN.a: Live fast, die young, and leave a beautiful corpse.

EN.q: What did the tortilla chip say to the avocado?
Why doesn't the avocado go to the gym?
EN.author: eden

EN.q: How do you make an avocado disappear?
EN.author: eden

EN.q: What do you call an old avocado?

EN.a: Don't be someone whose outside and inside are different.

EN.q: What do you call the end of the world for avocados?
EN.author: brice

lines.speaker: A
lines.text: Honey, go to the store, buy milk, and if they have avocados, get 6.

lines.speaker: A
lines.text: Alpha-cado here, do you copy? Over.

lines.speaker: B
lines.text: Bravo-cado here, loud and clear. Over.
